mapper.insert: insert into message(message_id, message, send_time, sender, chatroom_id) values(message_id_seq.nextval, #{message}, to_date(#{send_time}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss'), #{sender}, #{chatroom_id})
mapper.select: select * from chatroom where chatroom_id in (select chatroom_id from chatroom_member_relation where user_id = #{member_id})
